definition: to dismantle a machine/to terminate a telephone service
to tear open/to tear down/to tear apart/to open

sentences.english: The third month practice to dismantle the machine compulsory.
sentences.chinese: 到第三个月就实行强制拆机。

sentences.english: This paper presents a control method for a ladle residue cleaner in the Ma Steel Works.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了马钢固定式钢包钢渣清拆机的控制方法。

definition: to replace firmware (on a mobile device)
to promise to keep sth in good repair/guarantee/warranty
case, casing, cabinet or housing (of a computer, photocopier etc)
radiator (for heating a room)/radiator (for cooling an engine)
protective or tinted film (for LCD screens, car windows etc)/facial mask (cosmetics)
hardware-only device/computer without operating system or other software installed/mobile phone or pager without network subscription
